document.masterDocTitle: New taxonomic and nomenclatural data on Sarcophaga (Heteronychia) (Diptera: Sarcophagidae), with description of six new species

Heteronychia lyneborgi
: Paratypes : 2 3, 2 ƤƤ: Spain , Granada , Torrenueva, E of Motril,
17 .VI. 1966
, Lyneborg et al. leg. ( ZMUC ) [all with red “ Paratype ” label except one female with “Allotype” label].

Remark. The original type series of
Heteronychia lyneborgi
consists of the above four paratypes and the holotype 3 (
Rohdendorf 1975 : 199
), also from Torrenueva ( Spain ) and also deposited at ZMUC .

Remarks.
Pandelleola resnikae
was described by
Lehrer ( 1996 b)
on a single male from Mallorca (Balearic Is., Spain ), deposited at ZMAM . I consider
Pandelleola resnikae
and
Sarcophaga ( Heteronychia ) filia
to be conspecific, based upon the original description and illustrations by
Lehrer ( 1996 b: 261–263 , fig. 1 )
.
